author: hwright
msg: Allow PLAIN and LOGIN mechanisms with SASL in svnserve.
Allows authentication via LDAP to actually work, as advertised
by The Book. If plaintext passwords are a concern, users can
secure their network links by other means than TLS. We should
not be making this decision for them.

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #2580, svn+ssh SIGKILLs ssh processes
Without this fix, svn+ssh:// does not play nicely with ssh
See the issue for (an overwhelming amount of) details.

author: cmpilato
msg: Cast some votes.  (More to come, hopefully.)

author: stsp
msg: (sed_append): Escape the backslash. Some shells will eat it before the
string gets passed to sed, and sed expects to see the backslash.

author: stsp
msg: function can be used in libsvn_client. (It's not being used anywhere yet.)
